MDX.DbDetails:
item_properties i left join item_property i0 on i.property_id=i0.property_id where h_id item_id_m,propname,propvalue item_id_m,i0.prop_display_name propname,i.property_value propvalue
select %{data} from %{dbtable} where (i.org_id,item_id_m) IN (SELECT shipping_org_id,item_id_m from sd_so_line where %{where})
